title: The Skeleton Magician’s Play Diary - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Virtual Reality
author: 毛熊
description: A future where all-sense immersive VR devices have become widely popular. These devices are used in all fields, this is of course true of the gaming industry as well. Maybe it’s because people could get lost in different worlds, or because you could experience time travel to the distant future, but VR games of all genres were selling out quickly all over the world. A promising new VR game is swooping into the market. Its name is [Free Species World]. Its catch phrase is that its [A fantasy in which you can become any race]. You can be a human, beast or even a demon. Since it’s the first VR game in the world where you can be something other than a humanoid type, there were thousands of beta testing lotteries, and the reservations for the game was sold out within seconds. This is a play diary of an adult who made a name for himself by dominating over a continent through his resolve of playing a villain in the VR game that became so popular it caused a social phenomenon.>
